title: Solar Window Shades*, Billiards/shuffle board, Spa
posting_body: ['ASK ABOUT OUR CURRENT SPECIAL OFFERS!', 'Newly Renovated Apartments at the Street of SouthGlenn.', 'Convenient living is yours when you rent at The Portola at Southglenn Apartments in Centennial, Colorado.', 'Situated above cafes, restaurants and designer boutiques, The Portola at Southglenn is a community of studio, one, two and three-bedroom apartment homes with newly renovated features and beautiful Mountain and Downtown views.', 'Our floorplans come in 3 unique interiors styles with renovated units featuring upgraded cabinetry, fixtures, countertops, farmhouse sinks and new wood-style flooring.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 2', 'OR Text', '2', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1178 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Solar Window Shades*', '- Balcony*', '- Brushed Nickel Fixtures*', '- Washer & Dryer*', '- Updated Countertops*', '- Oversized Tubs*', '- Internet Access', '- Fridge with Dual Ice & Water Dispenser*', '- Farmhouse-style Sink*', '- Light fixtures upgrades*', '- Updated Cabinetry*', '- Refaced Cabinets/Cherry*', '- Mountain Views*', '*In Select Units', 'Community Amenities', '- Elevators', '- Heated Swimming Pool', '- Close', '- Fitness Center', '- Hot Tub', '- High-end Spin Bikes', '- Package Lockers', '- Clubhouse', '- Storage Areas', '- Gated Community', '- Outdoor Fire Pit', '- Onsite Recycling', '- Garage Parking', '- WiFi in Common Areas', '- Located at the Streets of Southglenn', '- Billiards/shuffle board', '- Spa', '- Dry Cleaner Service', '- Community Amenities Image', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats and Dogs Allowed.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Portola at SouthGlenn', '6851 South Gaylord Street, Centennial, CO, 80122', 'vZz13Bis']
